thread.title: Here's What Derek Theler Could Look Like As Shazam!
thread.title_full: Here's What Derek Theler Could Look Like As Shazam!

author: Charlie Ridgely
title: Here's What Derek Theler Could Look Like As Shazam!
text:
Here's What Derek Theler Could Look Like As Shazam! Charlie Ridgely 
Recently, actor Derek Theler has seemed to be campaigning for the tile role in the upcoming DC film, Shazam! The Rock has already been nabbed to play villain Black Adam, and he is currently meeting with DC executives about where the film could go . 
As for Theler, he seems to want to play opposite The Rock in the film. In several Instagram posts, he has stated how much he loves the character, and how much he looks up to the veteran actor. A photo posted by Derek Theler (@derektheler) on Sep 15, 2016 at 11:04pm PDT 
It seems that graphic artist BossLogic agrees with Theler's cries to play Shazam, and he's released a new image of the actor portraying the character. 
The artist has the eyes of fans around the nerd community, as his pieces always tend to be a great representation of what we could possibly see. 
Theler is seen in the photo posing in one of the classic Shazam poses, as he flexes with a smile. 
Theler certainly has the personality to play Shazam, as he always seems to be happy and uplifting. This also makes a great fit for The Rock, as he is of a very similar personality. (Photo: BossLogic) 
Click through the slides below to see the full photo of Theler as the DC character, as well as an array of BossLogic's other work. 
Shazam is slated to hit theaters sometime in 2009.
